posts.description: 46 Things That Would Change If "Harry Potter" Were Set In The U.S.A
posts.extended:
If Harry Potter were set in America:

-butterbeer = PBR
-mail delivered by bald eagles
-sorting hat = cowboy hat

posts.description: Investigative Reporters and Editors | Dataviz/Infographic Designer
posts.extended: Looking for static designers to make dope news graphics here at @vocativ - about as much fun as a person can have.

posts.description: Hannah Gold on Twitter: "Cincinnati police chief concerned about "possibility of unrest" when video of killing by UC campus police is released http://t.co/oByvjdIXaj"
posts.extended:
RT @adamjohnsonNYC: Note: Authorities have two options:
1 Prosecute killer cops
2 Prepare for unrest
They continue to choose the latter
